title: Yandere Male God‘s Sweetness Exploded - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Female Protagonist   Male Yandere   Multiple Identities   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Slow Romance   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 慕清潋
description:
In order to earn points to exchange for a body resurrection, Ran Muxun had no choice but to enter a battle of wits with the male god. 

System: Host, if you want to prevent the world from collapsing, you must first fulfil the capture target’s wish. 

Ran Muxun’s head hurt to no end, staring at the man before her……

“I….like you?” she tentatively sounded out.

The man smiled slightly, “in this case, I will allow you to be with me for a lifetime!”

System prompt: Capture target favourability value +10, Task completion progress -10

Ran Muxun was dumbfounded: This isn’t the same as what we agreed on ah…>
